verbose_text: Our results also demonstrated that natakalim enhanced the downregulation of endothelium derived nitric oxide, attenuated the upregulation of inducible nitric oxide synthase derived nitric oxide (NO), inhibited the upregulated endothelin system and corrected the imbalance between prostacyclin and thromboxane A 2.
evidence: nitric oxide synthase-derived nitric oxide (NO), inhibited the upregulated endothelin
